twcore.core.util
Class ByteArray

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.util.ByteArray

public class ByteArray
extends java.lang.Object

Internal storage class for holding an array of bytes, and performing various operations on it. Does not account for data that exceeds the intended size of an array.

getPartial

public static int getPartial(byte extractFrom,
                             int startIndex,
                             int endIndex)
Gets the bit fragment from startIndex to endIndex.

Parameters:
extractFrom - The byte to extract from
startIndex - The inclusive leftbound index: 1234 5678
endIndex - The inclusive rightbound index 1234 5678 and > startIndex
Returns:
The int extracted from the requested bits
